String.string: Speak with Rhodos at the Khirian Sanctuary.
Use the {@LinkCreature:172#1032#Khirian Sanctuary teleport platform} to get to Yaldaru Hills. Speak with Joakim when you get there.
Use the map Joakim gave you.
Cliffs by the Pools of Zurusuru
This looks like a good place to take off.
Examine the place marked on the map.
This must be the cave Joakim mentioned.
Examine the place marked on the map.
You are inside the hidden cave.
Use the {@LinkCreature:172#1072#teleportal} to go the Thaumetal Refinery.
Jump into the water to investigate below.
Defeat Birchback, then investigate deeper into the refinery.
This looks like some kind of mine.
Go deeper into the compound to find out more about what's going on.
Defeat the miner servitor, then investigate deeper into the compound.
See if Baidun has any information about the Archdevan Imperial Army's plan.
You can probably ride that trolley.
Go into the cave below and search for the secret laboratory.
The Archdevan Imperial Army is here!
Take the trolley to the end of the line, then jump into the cave below.
It's the hooded figure and the Archdevan Camp Commander.
They've been experimenting on the goblins!
Use the teleportal to get back.
Find Rhodos and tell him what happened.
